title:
WHY IS GAS CHEAPER ON THE OTHER SIDE OF 

 I-95  YESTERDAY JUNE 13, 2010 ON THE OTHER SIDE OF 95 IT WAS BETWEEN 2.39 AND 2.49 A GAL , AND WHEN I GOT BACK IN TO WILMINGTON  IT WAS 2.65 A GAL . ART WE ALL IN THE SAME STATE AND WE ALL PAR FOR OUR TAX\'S , OR IS IT BECAUSE WE LIVE BY THE OCEAN ?
